title: Ėl'khotovskiĭ nekropolʹ
description: Burial site in North Ossetia–Alania containing 58 burials associated with the Koban culture (8th-7th centuries BCE), as well as 26 medieval burials (14th century CE).

properties.description: Point representing the visible remains at Ėlʹkhotovskiĭ nekropolʹ, after Chshiev 2022.
properties.title: Google Earth location of Ėlʹkhotovskiĭ nekropolʹ
